Text: This doesn't work The trial still expires then you can't go back to a version that works. Don't use it!!!

I really hope DVT fixes their keygen to have a patch as this program auto updates to verify the key every time you upgrade or reset the software and you cant easily re enter a new key either.  I would buy it but $1950 so I can get a version that isn't throttled back is BS.

DVT used to have a good working version of this program but ever since Logiware added the licence verification to their software it seems I cant get a good working version anymore.
